entry.title: Awesome Chatgpt Updates on Jun 05 - Jun 11, 2023
entry.content:
Other

  • ⭐️ Generating code for automated RPA, e.g. automating the click sequence for house search in Redfin
  • Generating on-demand code contribution ideas for an about-to-be-fired Twitter employee
  • Generating stars constellations in an image
  • Building web AR scenes by using text commands
  • An extension that adds "Generate PNG" and "Export PDF" functions to ChatGPT's interface
  • Creating a trivia game using ChatGPT. For example, a game for guessing which city is featured in a picture
  • The Chinese version of AI dungeon using ChatGPT as the storytelling model (⭐1.4k)
  • ChatGPT outperforming Google search
  • ChatRPG — A Text Adventure Game with an Inventory and Health System using ChatGPT
  • Share your wildest ChatGPT conversations with one click (⭐1.8k)
  • Keep ChatGPT sessions fresh to avoid network errors + Cloudflare checks
  • Generate endless answers to random questions (in any language!)
  • Add widescreen + full-window modes to ChatGPT
  • Auto-clear ChatGPT history for more privacy

entry.title: Awesome Chatgpt Updates on Jan 09 - Jan 15, 2023
entry.content:
Featured

  • Publicly announced ChatGPT variants and competitors
  • A TikTok channel with ChatGPT demos

Prompting

  • ⭐️ Generating detailed prompts for text-to-image models such as Midjourney & Stable Diffusion
  • ⭐️ A comprehensive repository for everything prompt engineering, ChatGPT included (⭐59k)
  • Prompto - a community-ran directory of ChatGPT prompts

Assistants

  • A Chrome extension that plugs in ChatGPT to every textbox (Twitter, Google Docs, etc.)
  • ⭐️ Summarize web pages using OpenAI ChatGPT (⭐747)

Coding

  • ⭐️ Code debugging partner: explains and fixes bugs
  • ⭐️ Extension to use ChatGPT within VS Code
  • ⭐️ PR code review using ChatGPT (⭐562)

ChatGPT API

  • ⭐️ Lightweight package for interacting with the ChatGPT API by reversing engineering the official API (⭐28k)

ChatGPT explainers

  • ⭐️ An insightful executive summary of ChatGPT

Conversational

  • (Another) Chat with ChatGPT using voice

Thought-provoking

  • ⭐️ Running a virtual machine inside ChatGPT
entry.summary: 14 awesome projects updated on Jan 09 - Jan 15, 2023

entry.title: Awesome Chatgpt Updates on Dec 05 - Dec 11, 2022
entry.content:
Using ChatGPT in other apps

  • A Chrome extension that presents ChatGPT results next to Google Search
  • OpenAI ChatGPT desktop app for Mac, Windows, & Linux menubar using Tauri & Rust (⭐2k)
  • ChatGPT for Mac: access from menu bar (⭐6.4k)
  • ChatGPT Chrome extension
  • ChatGPT WhatsApp bot
  • ChatGPT Telegram bot

Assistants

  • An app builder such as an essay automated summarizer
  • Personal trainer and nutritionist
  • Generating legal contracts
  • Solving complex academic assignments
  • Generating editorial pieces like sports articles
  • Generating SEO titles to optimize sites Click Through Rate
  • emailGPT - a quick and easy interface to generate emails with ChatGPT

Coding

  • Building e-commerce websites: stitching ChatGPT & Node script to automatically generate SEO-driven blog posts using GPT 3
  • Streamlining cloud APIs to perform complex tasks
  • Solving complex coding questions
  • Answering unanswered Stack Overflow questions
  • Explaining complex regex without any context
  • A tutorial on how to use ChatGPT to create a wrapper R package
  • Generate an entire WordPress plugin based on a simple description

ChatGPT explainers

  • The Brilliance and Weirdness of ChatGPT

Conversational

  • An artist trains a chatbot using past notes and diaries to talk to her inner child
  • ChatGPT-conversation: talk to ChatGPT using your voice (⭐665)

Thought-provoking

  • Bypassing OpenAI's restrictions by disclosing ChatGPT's belief system
  • Uncovering ChatGPT's opinion of humans including a detailed destruction plan
  • Generating hallucinated chat with a hallucinated person in a hallucinated chat room
entry.summary: 26 awesome projects updated on Dec 05 - Dec 11, 2022
